TopicTitle: Openning up a new company, need a name

Articles.Content:
I wanted to open up a part manufacturer just producing some random parts, but I can't think of a name for myself yet.

all of my products are quality ensured to be:

-unique model, sometimes I grab free models from the internet, sometimes I make my own. But no stock models, and no models from other mods.

-Performance optimized low poly models and no unnecessarily large textures.

-High quality models with baked AO textures. no simple basic shapes.

-unique immersion descriptions

I already released one part, the SABRE engine :http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29111-SABRE-hybrid-rocket-engine

two more coming down the production line:

Big Stack of Gold (waiting for a larger and smaller version before release)

Si-Fi Engine

also two other small parts without models yet, one heat sink and one resource generator.

all these unrealistic parts run on "Mana", there is no Mana tank, each of these parts have their own Mana reserve and recharges slowly. Still OP, but just wanted to add this extra touch for comfort.

they've all been under the code name "magic" which is too lame to use here so I really need a good one.

Edited May 16, 2013 by 1096bimu
You can use your "second name" and add designs or magicdesigns, whatever you like.

So what happened to "Hakari's Hyperdimension Space Junks"? Just curious.

As to a new name, how about something like 'Yuttani Heavy Industries', or some variation on that spelling, maybe 'Youtani'? That way, if you ever collaborate with Devogen, you two could become 'Wayland-Youtani'. Just a thought...
